name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted (2012)
description: Only sets up Origin and DXVK you'll need to download Need for Speed: Most Wanted manually.
notes: Please read before installing: https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Game:-Origin - If Origin gets stuck on \"Finalizing\", restart the app through Lutris. - If there is no sound when launched try clicking the mouse once.

task.name: wineexec
task.description: Installing Origin... Login window will pop-up and close.

content:
files:
- setup: https://origin-a.akamaihd.net/Origin-Client-Download/origin/live/OriginThinSetup.exe
- updater: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DrDoctor13/wine-origin-updater/master/updateorigin.sh
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin/Origin.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: nocrashdialog
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    description: Installing Origin... Login window will pop-up and close.
    exclude_processes: Origin.exe OriginClientService.exe QtWebEngineProcess.exe
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- chmodx: updater
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin
    src: updater
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  overrides:
    nvapi,nvapi64: disabled
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
